fullplot: Bobby Boucher is the lowly waterboy for a college football team, until the coach discovers his amazing talent for tackling people much bigger than him. He signs the Waterboy as the new star player, but Bobby must keep it secret from his overbearing and domineering mother.
plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.
title: The Waterboy

tomatoes.consensus: This is an insult to its genre with low humor and cheap gags.
